Feat.Name: Improved Familiar

Prerequisites.Prerequisite: Ability to acquire a new familiar

Feat.Description: This feat allows you to acquire a powerful familiar, but only when you could normally acquire a new familiar.
Feat.Benefit: When choosing a familiar, the creatures listed below are also available to you. You may choose a familiar with an alignment up to one step away on each alignment axis (lawful through chaotic, good through evil).
